item.title: Azure Data Factory (ADF) - Basics
item.author: Matheus Macedo
item.description: Azure Data Factory: A Beginner’s Guide from a Developer’s Perspective As a developer stepping into the world of data integration I’m starting my studies on Azure Data Factory (ADF), it provides a powerful platform to tackle complex data workflows. In this beginner’s guide, we’ll explore the fundamentals of Azure Data Factory and get you started on your journey of building data pipelines. So, grab a cup of coffee, and let’s dive in!
